util.servlet.http

Class ResponseCharEncodingWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletResponseWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
        • util.servlet.http.ResponseCharEncodingWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

    public class ResponseCharEncodingWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponseWrapper
    Wraps an HttpServletResponse to call a response consumer just before the moment past which the response character encoding cannot be set anymore.

    • Field Summary
